duties_responsibilities.duty: Take responsibility for the strategy and execution of the region, including forecasting partnership pipeline, tracking, reporting, and optimizing partner performance
Bring on new channel partners as needed and manage them throughout the relationship
Collaborate with marketing team and partner's marketing team to execute local events and/or drive marketing initiatives
Take primary responsibility for the strategy and execution of building new partnerships in the Mexican region

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
